channel.title: Reversing on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Reversing on TLDRBins

item.title: Android
item.description: Unpack .apk file # Get .smali files java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar d app.apk # Get .java files jadx app.apk Ref: apktool Ref: jadx Re-pack .apk file 1. Initial pack java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar b --use-aapt2 app -o app_repacked.apk 2. zip align zipalign 3. Sign the apk keytool -genkey -v -keystore my-release-key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias my-alias apksigner sign --ks my-release-key.jks --ks-pass pass:<PASSWORD> --out app_final.apk app_repacked.apk Dynamic Debugging 1. Set up +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1.

item.title: Java
item.description: Java Decompile JAR jd-gui Ref: Download jd-gui Compile # Compile javac src/program.java # Pack into jar jar -cvf program.jar -C src/ .

item.title: Memory Dump
item.description: Tools binwalk pypykatz # Extract files from memory dump binwalk -M -e memory.dmp Ref: binwalk # Mini Dump pypykatz lsa minidump memory.dmp

item.title: Python Decompile
item.description: Tools pyinstxtractor uncompyle6 pycdc # Unpack pyinstaller packed binary pyinstxtractor test.elf # Install pip3 install uncompyle6 # Run (need .pyc extension) uncompyle6 script.pyc # Install git clone https://github.com/zrax/pycdc.git cd pycdc cmake . make make check # Run ./pycdc script.pyc Ref: pycdc
